text.name: Text28
text.caption: Sala Unid.Hidr. Bbas de Carga e Lastro

caption.caption: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

animateColor.expression: If ({#1.Sts.Falha} AND (NOT {#1.Sts.Atuado}))Then 0 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#3" ) <> 0) AND {#1.Sts.Atuado}) Then 1 Else If ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#3" ) <> 0) AND {#1.Sts.Atuado}) Then 2 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#3" ) == 0) AND (AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#3" ) == 0) AND (NOT {#1.Sts.Falha})) Then 3 Else 4
{#1.Sts.OM_Atuar} OR {#1.Sts.OM_Desatuar}
